title: Introduction to C Programming
posts: C is used in a wide range of applications, including operating systems, embedded systems, and application development. Understanding C programming involves learning about variables,

title: Introduction to Algorithms
posts: Algorithms are step-by-step procedures for solving problems, making decisions, or performing tasks. They are fundamental to computer science and play a crucial role in various fields.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
posts: C++ is a powerful programming language for Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA). It offers a concise syntax, a robust Standard Template Library (STL) for common data structures.

title: Basic Data Structures
posts: Basic data structures are the fundamental ways of organizing and storing data in a computer. They are essential for creating efficient and optimized algorithms and programs. There are different types of data structures.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
posts: Object-oriented programming (OOP) is a way of designing and writing programs by using objects and classes. Objects are entities that have attributes (data) and behaviors (methods). Classes are blueprints for creating objects.

title: Software Engineering
posts: Software engineering is a branch of computer science that uses engineering principles to develop computer programs and operating systems. A software engineer is a person who applies the engineering design process to design.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
posts: AWS stands for Amazon Web Services, which is the worldâ€™s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. Cloud computing is the on-demand delivery of IT resources over the Internet with pay-as-you-go pricing.

title: Database (MySQL)
posts: A database is a collection of data that is organized and stored in a way that allows easy access, manipulation, and analysis. MySQL is one of the most popular database management systems that uses the relational model to store data in tables.

title: Problem-Solving Part
posts: Problem-solving is a skill that involves finding solutions to various kinds of challenges or issues. It is often used in different domains, such as education, work, and everyday life. Problem-solving can be divided into different parts or stages.
